alert.note: Alert for Ashland (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 15 at 12:35PM CDT until further notice by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Tyler Forks near Tyler Forks River at Stricker Road near Mellen affecting Ashland and Iron Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Bad River at Odanah affecting Ashland County. .Heavy rain on top of the existing snowpack will increase the rate of snowmelt. The resultant runoff will cause water levels in area rivers to increase and flooding is expected. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...No flooding is currently forecast. * WHERE...Bad River at Odanah. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.5 feet, Minor flooding begins as water encroaches on State Street through the Sugar Bush. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 8.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.3 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.5 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - Flood safety information can be found at www.weather.gov/safety/flood. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Bad River Odanah 8.5 8.2 Sat 11 am CD 7.8 7.5 6.9 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/duluth. The next statement will be issued late tonight by 1245 AM CDT.
